items.summary: Search through the project's deployment configuration files (dfx.json, canister configuration files, or deployment metadata) to locate and extract the Internet Computer canister ID for the deployed Raavni Agrobyte application

Generate a comprehensive DNS configuration guide document that includes: (1) the specific full canister URL for the Raavni Agrobyte application, (2) step-by-step instructions for configuring Cloudflare DNS with the exact CNAME record settings needed to point raavni.com to the canister URL, (3) SSL certificate setup instructions for Cloudflare with recommended SSL/TLS mode settings, and (4) DNS propagation timeline and verification steps
